ComicInfo.Title: I Saw Diablo! The Demon from the Fifth Dimension!; The Strange Fate of the Statue Maker!; Only a Beast!; The Little Men
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:38:50. [CVDB76516] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:48:37. [Issue ID 96184]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Kirby,Al Eadeh,Sol Brodsky,Larry Lieber,Jack Kirby,Al Eadeh,Sol Brodsky
ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Ayers,Paul Reinman,Al Eadeh,Sol Brodsky,Larry Lieber,Dick Ayers,Paul Reinman,Al Eadeh,Sol Brodsky
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Saw Diablo! The Demon from the Fifth Dimension!: An extradimensional smoke monster invades the Earth. It could have destroyed humanity, but an adventurer tricks it by blowing out the smoke from a lighter, making it think humans can destroy it.
The Strange Fate of the Statue Maker!: An inventor accidentally invents a petrification device and decides to use it to turn attractive people into detailed statues. His first victim is so beautiful that he decides to release her, but accidentally petrifies himself.
Only a Beast!: A bed-ridden old man hates those who will inherit his money so he establishes hypnotic control of his dimwitted caretaker to have him do away with them.
The Little Men: An old man creates wooden statues that Leprechauns collect.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
